title: Far Cry 3

notes: Runs out of the box if you install the Crack. Something strange about this game, I played the pirated version when this first came out years ago, and I remember it looking stunningly beautiful. I got the game on a steam sale not too long ago, and played it on windows with uplay all the way. For some reason it looked different, even on ultra settings it looked far more ugly, like the textures were low-res or something. Yet here if I play the steam version with the crack, via Proton, it's back to looking all beautiful on ultra settings again. Did uplay install low res-textures on my version because I got the game at a discount? Or is Vulcan just look better looking API? I don't know, but in all honesty, maybe it's better we never get a uplay for Linux.
title: Far Cry 3

notes: As suggested, I used a crack to remove Uplay. Without Uplay it works perfectly.
title: Far Cry 3
